item.title: 【Requests】[REQ CAP] - Some great Glastonbury 2023 performances
item.description:
Hi. Please, anyone with a UK VPN or actually living in the UK can record these Glastonbury 2023 performances using get_iplayer?

https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/p0ftbct8/glastonbury-alison-goldfrapp
https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/p0ft1n54/glastonbury-sparks
https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/p0ftbbgd/glastonbury-slowdive
https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/p0ft7j6c/glastonbury-leftfield
https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/p0ftbd9f/glastonbury-weyes-blood
https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/p0ftbbc1/glastonbury-editors
https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/p0ft12s5/glastonbury-hot-chip
https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/p0ftbb3w/glastonbury-phoenix

The downloading commands (after you install and run get_iplayer) should be like:

Code:
get_iplayer --get --pid=THE_PID --tv-quality "1080p"
Replace THE_PID with the actual PID of each show (it's that code from the url after episode, e.g. p0ftbct8).
item.author: caladan
